meanings.definition: In a way that increases in speed or rate
meanings.sent1: The car sped up acceleratingly down the highway.
meanings.sent2: The rocket launched acceleratingly into space.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel raced acceleratingly to gather nuts before winter.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass acceleratingly as the deadline approached.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed acceleratingly after the heavy rainfall.

meanings.definition: In a manner that quickens or hastens
meanings.sent1: She typed acceleratingly to finish her work on time.
meanings.sent2: The wind howled acceleratingly through the trees.
meanings.sent3: The chef chopped vegetables acceleratingly to keep up with orders.
meanings.sent4: Laughter spread acceleratingly through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory spread acceleratingly across the town.
